text: María Paula Porras (born 18 March 2002) is a Costa Rican footballer who plays as a forward for Deportivo Saprissa and the Costa Rica women's national team. ==International goals== Scores and results list Costa Rica's goal tally first {| class="wikitable" |- ! title: María Paula Porras
